dct_title_s: Map of division of waterfont in Hoboken City, N.J.
dct_description_sm: Map covers area from South 2nd Street to Ferry Street along the Hudson River in Hoboken City. Map depicts the various property owners along the Hudson River such as the United Cos. of NJ, the Erie Railway Co., the Jersey Shore Improvement Co., Morris & Essex R.R. Co., and the Hoboken Land & Improvement Co. Map also shows the exterior line for filling and the exterior line for piers.
